attributes.action: give people over sixty a better lifestyle.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear prime minister,
like myself on pension credits there are
thousands of pensioners who are living on or below the poverty line,and although you have increased the winter fuel allowance,it will pay for the first part of the winters bill,as the hardest part of winter cold weather is
usually after christmas.
it would be nice of hm goverment to increase the basic pension for pensioners,as food prices are raising each day,last week i went into a store to buy a loaf of bread,on the monday it was .65p for their own label bread,on thursday i bought the same bread again and it had increased to 72p a loaf.and it is the same with other basic food prices.i do pray that your goverment will help the pensioners,and others on low income,i have always voted for labour all my life.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, such as a change in policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
